body.p:
Louisville 13th April /61
To His Excy B. Magoffin
Govr of Kentucky

I write this for Jas McMullin he has ben fined in the city court of Louisville in three cases I Believe it all was Done through prejudice on account of his Being a Southern Rights Democrat and I hope if you can with Justice to your Selfe Remit the fines as he is unable to pay them
P. S. the News from charleston makes the union men Hang their Heads our cause is Gaining Ground every day
